articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message to Chinese Party, State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message to Chinese Party, State Leaders
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the PRC, and Zhang Dejiang, chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC.
					 The message extended congratulations to Xi Jinping, Li Keqiang and Zhang Dejiang and, through them, to the Communist Party and the government of China and its people on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the PRC.
					
					 It wished the PRC prosperity and the Chinese people happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Nigerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of Armed Forces of Nigeria, on Sept. 28 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message said that since the independence the Nigerian people have met all challenges for the past 55 years and registered many successes in the work for the independent development and progress of the country and a new life.
					
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in political, economic, cultural and all other fields, the message sincerely wished the president fresh success in his responsible work for achieving peace and security of the country, consolidating national unity and building developed and prosperous Nigeria and good health and happiness.

articles.title: DPRK Will Join in International Current of Implementing "Post-2015 Development Agenda"
articles.content:
DPRK Will Join in International Current of Implementing "Post-2015 Development Agenda"
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will lively make equal and beneficial, economic collaboration and cooperation with different countries of the world and actively join in the international current of implementing the "Post-2015 Development Agenda".
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, the head of a DPRK delegation, said this at the UN summit for adopting the "Post-2015 Development Agenda" on September 27.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the agenda was adopted reflecting the will and desire of UN member states in the run-up to the 70th anniversary of the founding of the UN, saying that it is a significant event in the history of the UN.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The agenda adopted this time is a fruit of constant efforts made by the international community to eliminate the poverty throughout the world and accomplish sustained development.
					
					 It is still far from completely liberating humankind from poverty and building free, peaceful and prosperous world.
					
					 It is for this reason that we adopted the 2030 sustained development agenda reflecting the further detailed targets for reforming and transforming the world.
					
					 If the sanctions perpetrated from the medieval viewpoint going against the desire of developing countries for independence are connived, we won't be able to accomplish our good development goals.
					
					 Now our people are registering great successes never known in the work for the sustained socio-economic development while overcoming vicious sanctions and all challenges of the hostile forces under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We are trying to provide the people with a more affluent and modern life by giving priority to science and technology and fully enlisting potentials of self-supporting economy. This will make due contribution to the implementation of the sustained development agenda for transforming and reforming the world.

articles.title: Syrian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Ambassador Gives Reception
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy Wednesday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of Kim Il Sung University.
					 Present there on invitation were Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University who doubles as minister of Higher Education, Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and officials concerned.
					
					 A staff member of the embassy was on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: State Academic Decrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals of DPRK
articles.content:
State Academic Decrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- State academic decrees and titles were awarded to intellectuals who made contributions to the building of a socialist economic power and highly civilized nation with successes in their scientific research and educational work on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The title of academician went to Choe Hwa Il, teacher at Pyongyang University of Railways and the title of candidate academician to Jong Jong Hyon, researcher at Kim Chaek University of Technology, and other persons.
					
					 Professorship was awarded to Kim Sang Mun, Kim Kang and Yun Sun Chol, heads of departments of Kim Il Sung University, Ra Ju Hyon, head of a department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Ri Pyong Je, researcher at the Academy of Medical Science, Kim In Suk, head of a department of Wonsan Jong Jun Thaek University of Economics, and other persons.
					
					 Doctorate was awarded to So Kyong Nam, head of a department of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Kim Su Chol, head of a department of Kim Il Sung University, Choe Kwang Ryong, dean of a faculty of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Pok Gi, teacher at the University of National Economy, Rim Yong Nam, designer at the Paektusan Architectural Institute, and others and associate professorship to 186 persons.
					
					 The awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Gold Medal in Int'l Boxing Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Gold Medal in Int'l Boxing Tournament
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Un Song, a boxer of the DPRK, won a gold medal in men's 49 kg category of the 17th International Tournament on Boxing in Memory of Magomed-Salam Umakhanov, which was held some days ago.
					 He defeated his Uzbek rival in the finals after trouncing his Russian rival with a technical edge.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Kwang Suk of the DPRK bagged a silver medal in women's 60 kg category and Choe Tae Ho and Jang Un Hui bronze medals in men's 52 kg and women's 75 kg category.

articles.title: DPRK Athletes Qualified for 31st Olympiad
articles.content:
DPRK Athletes Qualified for 31st Olympiad
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Wrestlers of the DPRK have got qualifications for the 31st Olympic Games, according to results of the 2015 World Wrestling Championship.
					 Yun Won Chol, Jong Myong Suk and Jong Hak Jin respectively reached the standard set by the United World Wrestling in Greco-Roman men's 59 kg, women's freestyle 53 kg and men's freestyle 57 kg categories of the championship.
					
					 As of late September, 16 athletes of the DPRK are qualified for the 31st Olympiad in the events of marathon, shooting, wrestling and diving.
					
					 The number of DPRK entrants to the Olympiad is expected to increase in weightlifting, gymnastics and other events.

articles.title: Clarias Gariepinus Beta-actin Promoter Registered in NCBI
articles.content:
Clarias Gariepinus Beta-actin Promoter Registered in NCBI
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Clarias gariepinus beta-actin gene promoter was registered by the NCBI.
					 The promoter was developed by a research group of the Life Science Faculty of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Block Reunification of Korea under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Block Reunification of Korea under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The prevailing situation urgently demands all Koreans heighten vigilance over the U.S. persistent moves against reunification of Korea, decisively shatter them by concerted efforts of the nation and open up a turning phase for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and independent reunification. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article. 
					 Branding the U.S. interference in the issues of the inter-Korean relations and Korea's reunification as a shameless criminal act of trampling down the rights of the Korean nation to pioneer the independent destiny, the article goes on:
					
					 Every nation has a full-fledged right to independently carve out its own destiny, which no one can violate. 
					
					 The U.S., chieftain of the national division and root cause of misfortune and disaster of the Korean nation, is shamelessly interfering in the issues of the inter-Korean relations and national reunification and viciously hindering their solution, far from taking its hands off the Korean Peninsula. This is nothing but a brigandish act of those who are accustomed to the moves for domination and aggression of other nations. 
					
					 All Koreans should never allow the U.S. interference in the internal affairs of the Korean nation suffering pain of division generation after generation. 
					
					 It would be impossible for the Koreans to realize their aspiration for independent reunification by pooling their efforts if the U.S. is allowed to go on in their moves. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should launch the anti-U.S. struggle for independence, holding aloft the banner of national independence to check the U.S. persistent interference in the internal affairs of the Korean nation. 
					
					 The U.S. moves are a main obstacle blocking the inter-Korean reconciliation and unity and peace and reunification of Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmonger's Reckless Remarks against Improved Inter-Korean Relations Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmonger's Reckless Remarks against Improved Inter-Korean Relations Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed that the special warfare command of the south Korean puppet Army is pushing forward the formation of a special unit for "striking strategic core targets of the north" including "nuclear weapons and long-distance missile facilities" at a time when south Korean military gangsters are letting loose a string of invectives against the dialogue partner.
					 The special warfare commander appeared before "assemblymen" recently and acknowledged the fact, revealing belligerent hysteria such as "relevant operation in the north's areas". He also referred to the formation of a new air force unit to "guarantee swift infiltration operation of special unit".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says it is a reckless act of going against dialogue, cooperation and improvement of inter-Korean relations, a clear revelation of the invariable hostility and attempt at aggression against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove the sinister intention of the group of traitors hell-bent on realizing the ambition for invading the north, indifferent to the north-south dialogue and improvement of relations, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 This fully revealed once again that "confidence-building" and "peaceful unification" touted by the south Korean authorities are nothing but deceptive ones.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military gangsters are trying to strike nuclear treasured sword of the DPRK instilling fear into the U.S. and its followers, a foolish suicidal act just as jumping into fire with fagot on their backs.
					
					 The DPRK values dialogue and peace but will never pardon the warmongers bereft of reason and will mete out merciless punishment to them.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday to Be Marked in Angola
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- An Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed on September 24.
					 The director general of an Angolan newspaper was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits for the cause of the working class for the revolutionary party-building and hold diverse events including film show, photo exhibition, lecture and round-table talks on the occasion of October 10.

articles.title: Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for WPK: Myanmar Political Figure
articles.content:
Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for WPK: Myanmar Political Figure
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Only victory and glory are in store for the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by HE Kim Jong Un.
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said this in a statement on Sept. 22 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK and the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on October 10, 1945 and led the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution, the Fatherland Liberation War, the postwar rehabilitation and construction and the socialist revolution to victory by exceptionally enhancing the position and role of the party in the revolution and construction.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the outstanding idea of the President on building a party and his undying exploits and thus strengthened the WPK into a revolutionary party whose members are united in single mind guided by the Juche idea and a powerful party steering the Korean people's just struggle to victory.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, it has registered shining achievements in the efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country.
					
					 The statement expressed firm support and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in their just struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the country's reunification on the auspicious occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: Russian Papers Observe WPK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Russian Papers Observe WPK's Founding Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda Vladivostok No. 109 carried an article titled "Ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 The Korean revolution has won one victory after another under the banner of the Juche idea, Songun idea founded by the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Il thoroughly embodied the Juche idea, Songun idea during the whole period of leading the party by carrying forward the idea and cause of the President and consolidated the cohesion and unity of the WPK as firm as a rock.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of the preceding leaders without an inch of deflection, has pursued the policy of loving and respecting the people.
					
					 The Sept. 25th issue of Byvor carried an article titled "Down-with-Imperialism Union and Workers' Party of Korea" accompanied by a photo documenting the exploits of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said that the DIU was the first revolutionary organization of young communists of the new generation formed by Kim Il Sung during the period of the Japanese imperialists' military occupation of Korea.
					
					 The principle of independence set forth by the DIU has served as a basic principle of the WPK's building and activities, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a dirigentes de partido y estado de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a dirigentes de partido y estado de China
						
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 30 junto con Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, y Pak Pong Ju, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, un mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la RPCh, y Zhang Dejiang, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la RPCh.
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPCh, enviamos a ustedes, y por sus conductos, al PCCh, al gobierno y al pueblo de la RPCh felicitaciones en nombre del PTC, el gobierno y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Formulamos votos por la prosperidad de la RPCh y la felicidad del pueblo de vuestro pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un mensaje de felicitacion a Muhammadu Buhari, presidente y  comandante en jefe de las fuerzas armadas, de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la independencia de este pais africano.
					El remitente subraya que durante 55 anos transcurridos desde cuando alcanzo la independencia, el pueblo nigeriano logro muchos exitos en el trabajo para el desarrollo independiente y el progreso del pais y la creacion de nueva vida frustrando los desafios de todo tipo.
					
					Convencido de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas en todas esferas de la politica, la economia y la cultura las buenas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises con larga historia, el remitente formulo votos de todo corazon por nuevos exitos en el trabajo responsable del destinatario para lograr la paz y la seguridad del pais, consolidar la unidad nacional y construir Nigeria desarrollada y prospera, y su buena salud y felicidad.

articles.title: RPDC se unira a corriente internacional para realizar "Agenda de Desarrollo despues de 2015"
articles.content:
RPDC se unira a corriente internacional para realizar "Agenda de Desarrollo despues de 2015"
						
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El canciller Ri Su Yong, jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio el dia 27 un discurso en la Cumbre de la ONU para aprobar la "Agenda de Desarrollo despues de 2015".
					  Subrayo que la RPDC hara animadamente la cooperacion economica y otra colaboracion a base de igualdad y beneficios mutuos con varios paises del mundo y se unira activamente a la corriente internacional para realizar la agenda arriba mencionada.
					
					  La aprobacion de la agenda que refleja la voluntad y el deseo de los paises miembros de la ONU cuando se acoge el aniversario 70 de la ONU, es una cosa significativa en la historia de la ONU, destaco y continuo:
					
					  La recien adoptada agenda es el producto de los incesantes esfuerzos de la sociedad internacional por eliminar la pobreza y realizar el desarrollo sostenido en escala mundial.
					
					  Todavia es lejos el camino a seguir para liberar totalmente a la humanidad de la penuria y construir un mundo libre, pacifico y prospero.
					
					  Por esta razon aprobamos la agenda de desarrollo sostenido 2030 que refleja las metas detalladas para reformar y transformar el mundo.
					
					  Si se toleran tacitamente los actos de sancion que se cometen desde el punto de vista medieval nadando en contra de la aspiracion independiente de los paises en vias de desarrollo, no podremos lograr las magnificas metas de desarrollo aprobadas.
					
					Ahora el pueblo coreano alcanza grandes exitos sin precedentes en el trabajo para el sostenido desarrollo socio-economico superando audazmente la atroz sancion y todos desafios de las fuerzas hostiles interpuestos en el camino de avance bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Nuestros esfuerzos por ofrecer al pueblo una vida mas rica y civilizada anteponiendo la ciencia y tecnica y poniendo de pleno manifiesto la potencialidad de la economia independiente, contribuiran merecidamente a realizar la agencia de desarrollo sostenido para reformar y transformar el mundo.

articles.title: CRPP condena locuras conflictivas de mandataria surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP condena locuras conflictivas de mandataria surcoreana
						
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion de condena a la mandataria surcoreana quien volvio a lanzar en la escena internacional las locuras conflictivas.
					En el "discurso de base", pronunciado en el 70o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, la gobernadora surcoreana dijo que "el arma nuclear del Norte de Corea es una tarea a ser solucionada primero para convertir el mundo en la tierra sin armas nucleares", "la provocacion adicional del Norte de Corea dana el ambiente del dialogo N-S y deshonra los esfuerzos de los paises participantes en las conversaciones a 6 bandas por la reanudacion del dialogo para la desnuclearizacion", "el Norte de Corea debe esforzarse no por la provocacion adicional sino por la reforma y la apertura para que los habitantes se liberen de la dificultad" y otras maldiciones.
					
					Ademas expuso de modo abierto la ambicion de realizar la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion de regimenes" junto con las fuerzas extranjeras bajo el pretexto de la "unificacion pacifica", al cabo de denigrar la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando de la "exigencia de la sociedad internacional" y la "demanda apremiante de la mejora de los derechos humanos".
					
					Asi recuerda el documento calificandolo de provocacion imperdonable contra la RPDC y locura conflictiva destinada a destruir el ambiente de la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					De esta manera, la mandataria surcoreana puso al desnudo su naturaleza pro-yanqui y de confrontacion fratricida carente de juicio, revela la nota y continua:
					
					La mandataria surcoreana no habla ni una palabra sobre las armas nucleares de su amo norteamericano, cancer de la paz del mundo, y, al contrario, cuestiona las fuerzas disuasivas de la RPDC, espada justa para la defensa nacional, lo que no pasa de ser una queja de una sirvienta colonial que actua a ciegas sin saber que debe apoyar y que debe rechazar.
					
					En vez de prestar atencion a los asuntos del Sur de Corea, condenado como peor zona carente de DDHH, cuestiona atrevidamente los "DDHH" y la "vida de los habitantes" de alguien.
					
					Ella dijo descaradamente que "espero el dia en que todo el mundo felicite la unificacion de la ´Peninsula Coreana´" como lo hizo la ONU en el dia tragico de la fabricacion del ´poder´ titere de EE.UU.
					
					Todo esto es una abierta expresion de la ambicion de la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" que traera la guerra en esta tierra y acelerara la autodestruccion.
					
					Ya hemos advertido a las autoridades surcoreanas que las locuras pagaran muy caro.
					
					Debido a los imprudentes alborotos de confrontacion, estan en el estado peligrosisimo tanto las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas como el encuentro de las familias y parientes separados.
					
					Todas las opiniones publicas expresan unanimemente que las relaciones N-S se llevaran a la fase catastrofica en el caso de que las autoridades surcoreanas sigan lanzando tales injurias como ahora.
					
					Deseamos la mejora de relaciones N-S, pero, no tenemos la voluntad de dispensar magnanimidad a un rival que intenta confrontar con nosotros despreciando nuestra generosidad de reconciliacion.
					
					Las autoridades del Sur de Corea deben pedir disculpa ante la nacion por difamar a los connacionales y hablar con prudencia al tener presente que las palabras provocativas causaran las desgracias inesperadas.

articles.title: Otorgados a intelectuales grados academicos y categorias docentes
articles.content:
Otorgados a intelectuales grados academicos y categorias docentes
						
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, fueron otorgados los grados academicos y categorias docentes a los intelectuales quienes contribuyeron a la construccion de la potencia economica socialista y del Estado civilizado con los resultados de investigacion cientifica y la labor docente.
					Quedaron concedidos el titulo de academico a Choe Hwa Il, profesor de la Universidad de Ferrocarriles de Pyongyang, y el de candidato al academico, a Jong Jong Hyon, investigador de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, y otros.
					
					Recibieron el grado docente del profesor titular, Kim Sang Mun, Kim Kang y Yun Sun Chol, jefes de catedra de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Ra Ju Hyon, jefe de catedra de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Ri Pyong Je, investigador de la Academia de Ciencias Medicas, y Kim In Suk, jefa del Instituto Superior de Economia Jong Jun Thaek de Wonsan, y otros.
					
					So Kyong Nam, jefe de catedra de la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, Kim Su Chol, jefe de catedra de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Choe Kwang Ryong, jefe de facultad de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Kim Pok Gi, profesor del Instituto Superior de Economia Nacional, y Rim Yong Nam, disenador del Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan, y otros recibieron el grado academico de doctor, y 186 personas, la categoria docente de candidato al profesor titular.
					
					El acto de otorgamiento tuvo lugar el dia 30 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.

articles.title: Pugilista coreano logra medalla de oro
articles.content:
Pugilista coreano logra medalla de oro
						
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El boxeador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Un Song, logro la medalla de oro en la division de 49kg de la XVII Competencia Internacional de Boxeo de Magomed-Salam Umakhanov, efectuada recientemente.
					En la semifinal, el aplasto a su rival ruso y en la final vencio al boxeador de Uzbekistan.
					
					Por otra parte, en la division (f) de 60 kg, la boxeadora coreana Ri Kwang Suk ocupo el segundo lugar y en la division (m) de 52 kg y en la division (f) de 75 kg, Choe Tae Ho y Jang Un Hui ganaron la medalla de cobre, respectivamente.

articles.title: Luchadores coreanos obtienen boleto para la olimpiada
articles.content:
Luchadores coreanos obtienen boleto para la olimpiada
						
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los jugadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea obtuvieron el boleto para los XXXI Juegos Olimpicos 2015, segun los resultados del Campeonato Mundial de Lucha, efectuado hace poco.
					En el campeonato, Yun Won Chol (division masculina de 59kg del estilo grecorromano), Jong Myong Suk (division femenina de 53kg de lucha libre) y Jong Hak Jin (division masculina de 57kg de lucha libre) corresponden a la norma definida por la liga mundial de lucha.
					
					Segun los datos, hasta fines de septiembre, 16 jugadores coreanos (4 de ellos son varones) de maraton, tiro, lucha y salto al agua obtuvieron boleto para la olimpiada.
					
					Se preve que se aumentara el numero de los participantes en la olimpiada tambien en las diversas disciplinas tales como levantamiento de pesas, gimnasia de aparatos, que en estos dias logran considerable desarrollo.
